title: PostgreSQL SUM Function

metadata.description: Learn about PostgreSQL SUM Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
SUM
The
SUM()
function returns the total sum of a numeric column.
The following SQL statement finds the sum of the
quantity
fields in the
order_details
table:
Example
Return the total amount of ordered items:
SELECT SUM(quantity)
FROM order_details;
Run Example »
Note:
NULL values are ignored.

★
+1

quiz.question: What is NULL values?
quiz.explanation: The correct definition of NULL values is 'ignored'.

summary: This tutorial covers PostgreSQL SUM Function concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use PostgreSQL SUM Function effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of PostgreSQL SUM Function and how to apply it in your projects.
